940510.name: Devil Engine Demo
940510.description:
Take the game for a test run while we're tweaking the final build.
Contents are the same as the Tokyo Game Show 2018 build, but with adjustments based on feedback and new additions such as online leaderboards.
In addition, save data, stats and points earned will carry over to the full game!

Demo Features


  • Stage 1 and 2, completely uncut!
  • Full online leaderboard functions available
  • Tons of changes and tweaks since the last public build
  • Save data can be used for additional unlocks in the full game
940510.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语
